Package: net.frommknecht.pandoc.convert

[Groovy] Class PandocConverter

    • net.frommknecht.pandoc.convert.PandocConverter

    • Converter between different markdown representations like pure markdown text, json structure and internal objects.

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          JsonToMetaConverter  jsonToMetaConverter
          Converter between json and Metadata.
          JsonToPandocTypeConverter  jsonToPandocConverter
          Converter between json and Pandoc types.
          java.lang.String  pandocExe

          args - method arguments
          Returns:
          the method return value
